sentences.en: A formal contract is signed which is renewable annually.
sentences.cn: 正式签订了每年可续签的合同。

sentences.en: Eczema is a common skin complaint which often runs in families.
sentences.cn: 湿疹是一种常见的皮肤病，通常具遗传性。

sentences.en: He lived on an invalidity pension which came as a weekly giro.
sentences.cn: 他靠每周领取的作为病残养老金的直接转账救济支票过日子。

sentences.en: He was already asleep in the bed, which smelled faintly of mildew.
sentences.cn: 他已经在略带霉味的床上睡着了。

sentences.en: He was wearing shorts which showed his long, muscular, hairy legs.
sentences.cn: 他穿着短裤，露出自己强壮多毛的长腿。

sentences.en: It's a pound for a small glass of wine, which is pathetic.
sentences.cn: 一小杯葡萄酒要1英镑，真差劲。

sentences.en: Miranda was sure it was one of them, but was not sure which.
sentences.cn: 米兰达确定此人是他们其中的一个，但不能肯定是哪一个。

sentences.en: Politicians want a lap-dog press which will uncritically report their propaganda.
sentences.cn: 政客们想要的是不问是非、甘为他们搞宣传的哈巴狗一样的新闻媒体。

sentences.en: Show me which one you like and I'll buy it for you.
sentences.cn: 指给我看你喜欢哪个，我给你买。

sentences.en: The judges could not decide which category it belonged in.
sentences.cn: 评委们无法判定它属于哪一类。

sentences.en: there is no confusion as to which is which.
sentences.cn: 哪个是哪个，不会混淆。

sentences.en: This, after all, is a company which is awash with cash.
sentences.cn: 这毕竟是一家现金充裕的公司。

sentences.en: We can now talk openly about AIDS which we couldn't before.
sentences.cn: 现在我们能公开谈论以前讳言不提的艾滋病问题。

sentences.en: We could not reason out which way the robbers escaped, because we were unable to find any trace of them.
sentences.cn: 我们推断不出这些强盗是从哪个方向逃走的，因为我们找不到他们的任何踪迹。

sentences.en: We gained a rich supply of data which would normally be inaccessible.
sentences.cn: 我们得到了通常难以获取的大量数据。

sentences.en: We guarantee that you will find a community with which to socialise.
sentences.cn: 我们保证你们会找到自己的交际圈。

sentences.en: We were in the same college, which was male-only at that time.
sentences.cn: 我们那时在同一所学院，当时只招男生。

sentences.en: Which are the most important crops?
sentences.cn: 哪些农作物是最重要的？

sentences.en: Which book are you looking for?
sentences.cn: 你在找哪本书？

sentences.en: Why not retrain for a job which will make you happier?
sentences.cn: 为什么不接受新的培训，找一份让你更快乐的工作？

phrases.tran_cn: 哪一个是哪一个；什么是什么

trans.tran_en: used to ask or talk about one or more members of a group of people or things, when you are uncertain about it or about them
used to ask or talk about one or more members of a group of people or things, when you are uncertain about it or about them
